artist: Delineator: Charles Eisen; Engraver: Étienne Ficquet
description: bust length portrait of man seated right looking left; long curly hair; black robe with twisted white neck cloth; in a sheild-shaped cartouche; landscape painting at left of portrait and to right landscape with a stature, columns on a building and ships
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Eisen del.   Ficquet sculp. / JEAN / LINGELBAC | in pencil on sheet 1-559
title: Portrait of Jean Lingelbac
